## Portfolio

---

### SVG Transformations

Example of tweening svg paths from one shape to another using Flubber and D3 js.

<img src="/assets/images/svg-animation.png?raw=true" />

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/JavaScript-white?logo=JavaScript)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/D3.js-white?logo=d3.js)](#) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Flubber.js-white?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](#)

[Demo App](https://animated-svg-avatar.web.app/) \
[View code on GitHub](https://github.com/tcanbolat/Smooth-SVG-Transformations)
